c74object.name: sensor_fusion
c74object.digest: Fuse IMU data with sensor fusion
c74object.description: Fuse IMU data with sensor fusion

attribute.name: accelRejection
attribute.digest: Threshold (in degrees) used by the acceleration rejection feature
attribute.description: Threshold (in degrees) used by the acceleration rejection feature. A value of zero will disable this feature. A value of 10 degrees is appropriate for most applications.

attribute.name: convention
attribute.digest: The orientation of the sensor in the device
attribute.description: The orientation of the sensor in the device

attribute.name: gain
attribute.digest: Determines the influence of the gyroscope relative to other sensors
attribute.description: Determines the influence of the gyroscope relative to other sensors. A value of zero will disable initialisation and the acceleration and magnetic rejection features. A value of 0.5 is appropriate for most applications.

attribute.name: gyroRange
attribute.description: Gyroscope range (in degrees per second). Angular rate recovery will activate if the gyroscope measurement exceeds 98% of this value. A value of zero will disable this feature. The value should be set to the range specified in the gyroscope datasheet.

attribute.name: magRejection
attribute.digest: Threshold (in degrees) used by the magnetic rejection feature
attribute.description: Threshold (in degrees) used by the magnetic rejection feature. A value of zero will disable the feature. A value of 10 degrees is appropriate for most applications.

attribute.name: recoveryTriggerPeriod
attribute.digest: Acceleration and magnetic recovery trigger period (in samples)
attribute.description: Acceleration and magnetic recovery trigger period (in samples). A value of zero will disable the acceleration and magnetic rejection features. A period of 5 seconds is appropriate for most applications.

attribute.name: useMagnetometer
attribute.digest: enable if your device has a magnetometer
attribute.description: enable if your device has a magnetometer
